p: Figure 2 shows the XRD result of the fabricated SAFFs. Clearly, all mainly diffraction lines for the Al (04-0787, the Fm-3m (225)), and the Fe 2O 3 (33-0664, R-3c (167)) were identified, demonstrating the presence of Al and Fe 2O 3, in the product, which is characteristic of nano-composite films deposited by the EPD technique. In addition, no peak for Al 2O 3 or Fe indicated no reaction between the Fe 2O 3 and the Al, during a typical EPD process.
